name: Shade Hunters
description:
Reclaim a silenced research laboratory under siege from a mysterious threat. This roguelite RPG offers:

-Randomized skills (and everything else) for each playthrough
-Hard-hitting active time-based (ATB) combat
-An original soundtrack
-Numerous unlockable characters and secrets
-Variable difficulty levels and plenty of secrets to be uncovered
-Sci-fi humor through a "dad joke" lens
-Puzzles - including some not intended for you!
